input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to reach level 99 in castlevania dawn of sorrow?
input_text.Response A:
Sure, here are some tips to help you reach level 99 in Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow:

1. Play on Hard Mode - This will give you more experience points for defeating enemies.
2. Farm for Experience - If you're having trouble defeating enemies, try farming for experience. This means you'll need to play through the game multiple times, but you'll be able to gain experience points more quickly.
3. Level Up - Once you've gained enough experience points, level up your character. This will give you more health and damage, which will make it easier to defeat enemies.
4. Find Secret Rooms - There are hidden rooms in the game that will give you extra experience points. Look for them and explore them when you find them.
5. Kill Bosses - Bosses will give you a lot of experience points, so make sure you kill them when you encounter them.
6. Collect Experience Orbs - When you defeat enemies, they will sometimes drop experience orbs. Collect them to gain extra experience points.
7. Be Patient - Reaching level 99 in Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow will take time and patience. Don't get discouraged if you're not seeing results quickly.

I hope these tips help you reach level 99 in Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow. Good luck!
input_text.Response B: Sure, to reach level 99 in Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow, you need to complete all of the game's main quests, including the final boss fight.  This will take a lot of time and effort, but it's definitely possible!  You'll also need to collect a lot of experience points along the way, which you can do by defeating enemies and completing side quests.
